amendment.description: To combat money laundering and terrorist financing, to increase penalties for smuggling goods into the United States, and for other purposes.

action.text: Amendment SA 3855 ruled non-germane by the chair.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 3855.

Amendment SA 3855 proposed by Senator Sessions for Senator Grassley. (consideration: CR S10345-10346) To combat money laundering and terrorist financing, to increase penalties for smuggling goods into the United States, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3855 proposed by Senator Sessions for Senator Grassley.
